Articles.Content:
Hello people viewing this! I am currently trying to make a Mig-15 but i can't get the right parts to do so, Could someone please edit, and give me an AV-R8 Winglet about the same dimensions as the Swept wings? Also could you give me another AV-R8 Winglet that's just a little bit smaller? And lastly, can I get a Turbojet Engine that is REALLY small? Thank you for the help.

~ThatOneGuy
You might want to try copying the parts you want, rename them, and set the rescale factor to something else.
